snippet: The family of a comedian killed in the New Jersey Turnpike crash that seriously injured the performer Tracy Morgan has settled a wrongful death claim with Walmart.
lead_paragraph: The family of a comedian killed in the New Jersey Turnpike crash that seriously injured the performer Tracy Morgan has settled a wrongful death claim with Walmart.

headline.main: Family of Man Killed in Tracy Morgan Crash Settles
headline.print_headline: Family of Man Killed in Tracy Morgan Crash Settles
